'''Ring of Raining Blades (II)''' is one possible quest item from the [[commission]] "[[Cliffhanger]]," only obtainable if [[Jiangzhou]] was one of the two NPCs selected for the iteration of the commission.

Submitting this item to [[Tea Master Liu Su]] determines the story he tells during the commission. It is a follow-up to [[Ring of Raining Blades (I)]].
